net.hudup.core.alg

Class FilterList

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.alg.FilterList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class FilterList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class contains a list of filters, called filter list as a convention. This class provides utility methods for process such list, for example, getting filter, adding filter, removing filter, etc. Note, filter represented by Filter interface specifies tasks which be performed before any actual recommendation tasks.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • prepare

        public void prepare(RecommendParam param)
        Setting up (preparing) the recommendation parameter over all filters in this list. The preparation is performed before doing the filtering tasks. Of course this method calls Filter.prepare(RecommendParam) many times.
        Parameters:
        param - specified recommendation parameter.

      • filter

        public boolean filter(Dataset dataset,
                      FilterParam param)
        Performing filtering tasks over all filters of this list. The filtering tasks are based on specified dataset and filter parameter. Of course this method calls Filter.filter(Dataset, FilterParam) many times.
        Parameters:
        dataset - specified dataset.
        param - specified filter parameter.
        Returns:
        whether filtering tasks are performed successfully.

      • filter

        public boolean filter(Dataset dataset,
                      java.util.Collection<FilterParam> params)
        Performing filtering tasks on all filters of this list. The filtering tasks are based on specified dataset and many filter parameters. Of course this method calls Filter.filter(Dataset, FilterParam) many times.
        Parameters:
        dataset - specified dataset.
        params - specified collection of filter parameters.
        Returns:
        whether filtering tasks are performed successfully.

      • filter

        public boolean filter(Dataset dataset,
                      FilterParam[] params)
        Performing filtering tasks on all filters of this list. The filtering tasks are based on specified dataset and many filter parameters. Of course this method calls Filter.filter(Dataset, FilterParam) many times.
        Parameters:
        dataset - specified dataset.
        params - specified array of filter parameters.
        Returns:
        whether filtering tasks are performed successfully.
